title: Family Ranger Talk (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Topics vary. Meet in front of the Yosemite Valley Welcome Center (shuttle stop 2.)

Program hosted by the National Park Service.
location: Meet outside the welcome center, located next to Yosemite Village Parking. Use Shuttle Stops 1, 2, or 4.

title: Historic Ahwahnee Hotel Tour (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Learn about the history behind Yosemite’s famous luxury hotel on this complimentary one-hour tour.
Meet on the hotel’s back lawn.

Program hosted by Yosemite Hospitality.

title: In the Field: Creative Smartphone Photography (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Join a staff photographer to learn how to make better photographs with the camera you always carry.

Classes hosted by The Ansel Adams Gallery.
location: The Ansel Adams Gallery is located in Yosemtie Village, near shuttle stop 5.

title: The Ansel Adams Gallery Photography Walk (Yosemite Valley)
description: Join a staff photographer for a brief field lecture in Yosemite Valley. Space is limited; registration required.
location: The Ansel Adams Gallery is located in Yosemite Village, near shuttle stop 5.

title: Discovery Walk (Yosemite Valley)
description: Join a ranger for an easy walk and learn more about what makes Yosemite special. Topics vary daily. Meet in front of the museum in Yosemite Village (use shuttle stop 5.)

title: Guided Nature Walk (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Join a naturalist for an easy guided walk of Yosemite’s natural areas. Meet at the Yosemite Valley Lodge Amphitheater, near the lodge's front office (use shuttle stop 7.)

Program hosted by Yosemite Hospitality.
location: The Yosemite Valley Lodge amphitheater is located in the courtyard behind the Lodge front desk. Use Shuttle Stop 7 or Yosemite Falls Parking.

title: Yosemite After Dark (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Grab a flashlight and join a Yosemite naturalist for a nature walk at night!

Program hosted by Yosemite Hospitality.
location: Yosemite Valley. Meetup location provided upon registration.

title: Evening Programs (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Yosemite naturalists present a variety of topics on natural and cultural history. Meet at the Yosemite Valley Lodge Cliff Room (between the lounge and gift shop. Use shuttle stop 7.)

Program hosted by Yosemite Hospitality.

title: In the Field: Creative Smartphone Photography (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Join a staff photographer to learn how to make better photographs with the camera you always carry.

Classes hosted by The Ansel Adams Gallery.
location: The Ansel Adams Gallery is located in Yosemtie Village, near shuttle stop 5.

title: In the Footsteps of Ansel Adams (Yosemite Valley)
description:
Join a staff photographer for a field class around Yosemite Valley.

Classes hosted by The Ansel Adams Gallery.
location: The Ansel Adams Gallery is located in Yosemtie Village, near shuttle stop 5.
